data.persona: We are an elite group that is tasked with providing fire-based support in battle. Our specialty lies in the use of the flame, which we wield with great efficiency. Pyromaniacs they may call us, but it is just our sworn duty to the crown to us.
data.description:
You are in the The bar.
Made from wood and stone, the tavern smells of food and ale. A flame is burning in the fireplace and candles light up tables throughout the room.
There's a traveler and a Crow bar here.
The traveler and the police are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to steal the cell phone from the police so that the firemen can prank them.
data.mid_motivation: I will find information about the police that we can use to humiliate them.
data.long_motivation: I have an intense rivalry with the police and are plotting to get revenge on the police after they defeated us in the sports tournament.
